value.title: The many faces of artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence has graduated from science fiction to being applied to almost everything. One dental hygiene manufacturer has even claimed its electric toothbrushes now incorporate the technology.

value.title: Aurora self-driving trucks are using Uber Freight to haul goods for customers
value.excerpt: Aurora’s self-driving trucks are hauling goods for Uber Freight customers in Texas as part of a multiphase commercial pilot that aims to more closely integrate the two companies.  While the pilot was officially announced Wednesday,

value.title: Robot nurse assistants join Shannon Hospital amid Texas healthcare worker shortage
value.excerpt: "We are one of the first hospitals in the country to have this technology," said Lyndy Stone, Shannon's director of marketing.

value.title: Famed Robot-Run ETF Says This Is Why It Now Has Tesla As Its Top Holding
value.excerpt: The Qraft AI-Enhanced U.S. Large Cap Momentum ETF (NYSE:AMOM), an exchange-traded fund driven by artificial intelligence that acquired a new stake in Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) earlier this month, has revealed why it now has the electric vehicle maker as its top holding.

value.title: Human Common-Sense, Animal Cognition, And AI Advances For Autonomous Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Human common sense is difficult for AI developers to infuse into AI systems, including self-driving cars. We might learn something from animal common sense to help out on this vexing matter.

value.title: Forethought nabs $65M Series C to improve customer service with AI
value.excerpt: Forethought, a startup looking to put AI to work across customer service, won the TechCrunch Disrupt Battlefield and soon after landed a $9 million Series A. Well, three years later that company just landed a $65 million Series C,

value.title: Timnit Gebru’s new AI institute is a challenge to Silicon Valley
value.excerpt: A little over a year has passed since Timnit Gebru was fired from Google. The 38-year old Ethiopian-American researcher and former co-lead of the company’s Ethical AI unit, believes she was pushed out for working on an academic paper that raised red flags about using large language models in Google’s quest to develop “superintelligent” AI systems.

value.title: Three Strategies For Filling Tech Roles During The Talent Shortage
value.excerpt: The technology job market has never been more competitive than now, and employers and employees alike are struggling to find the best fit.

value.title: Papaya raises $50M for computer vision that facilitates bill payment
value.excerpt: Papaya, a startup developing a computer vision-powered app that facilitates bill payments, has raised $50 million in capital.

value.title: 14 Smart Ways Marketers And Advertisers Can Leverage AI In 2022
value.excerpt: Companies can lean on AI and machine learning to create more engaging content, analyze data to make better business decisions, automate customer support and more.

value.title: AI: Decoded: Algorithmic management — Deepmind’s language model — Don’t hate the player
value.excerpt: How global thinking on AI is shaping the world, from Berlin, Brussels, London and beyond. POLITICO’s AI correspondent cuts through the noise, introduces you to the key decision-makers you’ve never heard of and tells you what those in power don’t want you to know.

value.title: How much maths is enough for Machine Learning?
value.excerpt: So I have seen a lot of posts on this topic and some of them very controversial. I need to throw in my opinion on what I think you need to succeed.

value.title: Xpeng Motors fined by Chinese watchdog for facial recognition breach
value.excerpt: Chinese automaker Xpeng has been fined by China’s local market watchdog for collecting customers’ facial data without consent.

value.title: Time to set global rules for AI warfare, China tells UN weapons review
value.excerpt: Beijing envoy to UN Li Song says China opposes use of AI ‘to seek absolute military superiority and to undermine the sovereignty and territorial security of other countries’.

value.title: OpenAI begins allowing customers to fine-tune GPT-3
value.excerpt: OpenAI has launched a new capability that allows users of the OpenAI API to fine-tune GPT-3 models for specific use cases.

value.title: MLCommons releases open-source datasets for training speech recognition models
value.excerpt: The MLCommons Association, a nonprofit consortium that has the goal of improving machine learning for the public good, has announced the release of two key new datasets that it says can be leverage by organizations to develop superior artificial intelligence models.

value.title: Veritone’s Ryan Steelberg on Building an AI Deployment
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence needs to be demystified if it is to be effectively deployed, says a leading industry expert.

value.title: Build GAN with PyTorch and Amazon SageMaker
value.excerpt: GAN is a generative ML model that is widely used in advertising, games, entertainment, media, pharmaceuticals, and other industries. You can use it to create fictional characters and scenes, simulate facial aging, change image styles, produce chemical formulas synthetic data, and more. For example, the

value.title: Wall-climbing HB1 robot could find work in high places
value.excerpt: It's safe to say that any task which involves going up high is at least somewhat dangerous. The HB1 robot was designed with this fact in mind, as it climbs walls and even scuttles across ceilings so people don't have to.

value.title: Zhejiang University: Joint efforts called for to promote AI ethics
value.excerpt: A multi-country panel of scholars, researchers and stakeholders called for global efforts to tackle the peril of AI usage with AI ethics at the Workshop themed on “the AI Ethics & Internet Governance: Global Lessons & Practices”.

value.title: Pittsburgh-area robotics/AI proposal named as finalist in ‘Build Back Better Regional Challenge’
value.excerpt: The Southwestern Pennsylvania New Economy Coalition’s proposal was chosen Monday as one of 60 finalists as part of the American Rescue Plan’s Build Back Better Regional Challenge, which offers up to $100 million in funding to advance a regional industry.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence in Manufacturing Markets, 2028 By Component, Technology (ML, NLP, Computer Vision), Application (Predictive Maintenance Qualit
value.excerpt: The "Artificial Intelligence in Manufacturing Market By Component, Technology, Application, Industry Vertical, & Geography - Global Forecast to 2028" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.

value.title: Audiobooks – An Under-Served Market For Artificial Intelligence Voice Text And Voice Solutions
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) can provide technology that can streamline audiobook production and meet the constantly increasing demand.

value.title: Mobility software startup Apex.ai lands supplier giants Continental, ZF as investors
value.excerpt: The four years that Apex.ai spent rewriting — and then safety certifying — the robot operating system to give automakers and other mobility companies a toolkit to integrate software applications into vehicles has paid off.

value.title: Can AI Help Make Social Media More Accessible, Inclusive And Safe?
value.excerpt: In the latest edition of our “On AI Ethics” series, we caught up with Ramit Sawhney, Lead AI Scientist at Sharechat. Learn more about how the India-based social media unicorn leverages machine learning to to further its mission.
